name: BBirthday - Visual Novel
description:
Help Bianca to relive the 15 years of her life, but from another perspective 👁️. Enjoy this dreamcore style visual novel with escape room and horror elements. Unlock different endings. ✨

Meet Bianca's friends
Discover their true nature and intentions, do they really love Bianca?



Explore Bianca's fears
Run away from multiple rooms, something terrible is probably waiting for you around the corner.



Defeat her nightmares
Multiple boss fights, you can select difficulty level from easy to hard.



Join to the YunSeven Games community
https://discord.com/invite/kTK2FyNgP6
